title: How to make more people play ARAM
body:
Hello everyone! 
Firstly I think most people don't play ARAM so often because you can't pick choose your champ. I understand why you can't do this, because people would only play champions like xerath etc. But instead of being given a random champion why not let people choose from maybe 5 different random champions that you are given. This way it would be much more fun in my opinion. The rerolls could give you 5 new champs to choose from instead. I hope RIOT will take this idea into consideration.

replies.body: I'd be willing to bet that ARAM is the most played mode in league. I wish they would release the numbers.
The reason people don't play ARAM is because is hugely stacked against you if you don't happen to have a an ARAM only account.
I would actually stop playing ARAM if that happened, ARAM accounts are bad enough as it is

Since when did ARAM even have problems with queue times?
Stop fixing what isn't broken. 

The garbage tank update happened and you still want Riot to randomly "fix" stuff?
I would rather there only be a choice of 3 to make re-rolls more meaningful
